Interface StockGetter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseController

    public interface StockGetter
    Interface for getting stock data

    • Method Detail

      • getStock

        Stock getStock(java.lang.String name)
        A method that will get stock information about a particular company.
        Parameters:
        name - The name OR ticker of the company for which stocks are required.
        Returns:
        A Stock class with information about the companies stock.

      • getStock

        Stock getStock(java.lang.String name,
               java.util.Date date)
        A method that will get stock information about a particular company, given a date.
        Parameters:
        name - The name OR ticker of the company for which stocks are required.
        date - The date from which to get the stock info
        Returns:
        A Stock class with information about the companies stock.

      • getSector

        Sector getSector(java.lang.String name)
        A method that will get stock information about a particular sector.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the sector.
        Returns:
        A Sector class with information about sector.

      • getSector

        Sector getSector(java.lang.String name,
                 java.util.Date date)
        A method that will get stock information about a particular sector.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the sector.
        date - The date from which to get info.
        Returns:
        A Sector class with information about sector.

      • getSectorStocks

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSectorStocks(java.lang.String sectorName)
        Gets all the companies from a particular sector
        Parameters:
        sectorName - the name of the sector
        Returns:
        a list of tickers of stocks from that sector

      • getTicker

        java.lang.String getTicker(java.lang.String stockName)
        Gets the ticker of a particular stock
        Parameters:
        stockName - The stock name
        Returns:
        the stock's ticker

        A method that retrieves the latest stock data and adds to the database
